sql_result.sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.enroll_year, student.gender, major.major_name FROM student JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE student.enroll_year = 2023 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND student.gender = '女' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM base

entity_mappings.reason: 根据字段描述“入学年份（常见问法：22级）”映射，23级对应入学年份2023
根据字段描述“专业名称，专业实体映射主字段”，'计科'是'计算机科学与技术'的常见简称
根据字段描述“性别（男/女等）”映射，'女生'对应值为'女'

output.executed_sql: WITH base AS (SELECT student.enroll_year, student.gender, major.major_name FROM student JOIN major ON student.major_id = major.id WHERE student.enroll_year = 2023 AND major.major_name = '计算机科学与技术' AND student.gender = '女' AND student.is_deleted = 0 AND major.is_deleted = 0) SELECT COUNT(*) AS count FROM base
